item.title: I-70 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 37 - BL-70/Clifton/Delta. This is the eastern end of the Grand Junction business loop.

item.title: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287
item.description: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287 in Limon. Turn right for Burlington (via I-70); turn left for Denver (via I-70).

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 26 - BL-70/US-6/US-50/Grand Junction. Continue east on I-70 for Denver. This is the eastern end of the Grand Junction business loop. Grand Junction is the largest city in Colorado west of the Rocky Mountains.

item.title: BL-70 West at US-50
item.description: BL-70 west (Ute St.) at US-50 (5th St.) in Downtown Grand Junction. Turn left on US-50 for Delta and Montrose. Continue straight on Ute St. for BL-70/US-50 west.

item.title: BL-70 West - 29 Road Interchange
item.description: BL-70 west at Teller Road/To 29 Road interchange, in Grand Junction.

item.title: US-6 West/BL-70 West Split
item.description: US-6 West/BL-70 West Split in Grand Junction. Merge right for US-6 West (North Ave.); merge left for BL-70 West.

item.title: US-6/BL-70 West at US-6/BL-70 Split
item.description: US-6/BL-70 West at US-6/BL-70 Split in Grand Junction. Merge right for US-6 West/North Ave. Merge right for BL-70 West/To US-50/Delta/Montrose.

item.title: US-50 West at I-70
item.description: US-50/US-6 west at I-70 junction at western edge of Grand Junction.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 37
item.description: I-70 West at BL-70/To US-6/Clifton/Grand Junction.
